Syntax & Typographic Elements

Marking up the text
Syntax

<Element Attribute="Value">Content</Element>

<h1 class="panel-heading">Chicken</h1>

Opening Tag

<Element>

Closing Tag

*not all HTML elements have a closing tag.

</Element>
